subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Curtis Granderson of the Yankees hit a grand slam to lead a team of major league players to a 7-0 win over Taiwan’s national team in Xinzhuang in the first game of a five-game series.
snippet: Curtis Granderson of the Yankees hit a grand slam to lead a team of major league players to a 7-0 win over Taiwan’s national team in Xinzhuang in the first game of a five-game series.
